message: Add filesystem reconciliation to keep Laguz index in sync (v1.8.5)
Wire up Edit button in Dagaz event detail (v0.19.6)
Enable text selection for emails, phone numbers, and links in Kenaz & Dagaz
Add clickable clear button for orphaned sync queue entries
Fix RSVP regression: prevent sync from overwriting accepted invites
Fix RSVP'd events reappearing as needsAction with incrementing pending count
Fix pending/needs-response count mismatch showing empty list with badge
Fix multiple context menus stacking on right-click in Dagaz
Bump kenaz to 0.21.6 and raido to 1.4.1
Fix UTC date drift causing wrong Today badge count and task inclusion
